ABOUT.TITLE:
Two Companies.
One Vision for a Safer Future.
ABOUT.DESC: We are a premier alliance dedicated to the development and protection of Saudi Arabia’s infrastructure.

ABOUT.SAMA_DESC: Leader in supply, installation, and maintenance of cutting-edge firefighting systems.

VAL1.TITLE: Accuracy & Speed
VAL1.DESC: Delivering precision results utilizing the latest engineering methods.

VAL2.TITLE: Honesty & Integrity
VAL2.DESC: Transparent dealings and trusted partnerships are our foundation.

VAL3.TITLE: Technical Development
VAL3.DESC: Continuous upgrade of our engineering assets and software.

VAL4.TITLE: Time Commitment
VAL4.DESC: Strict adherence to project schedules and delivery milestones.

PHILOSOPHY.LABEL: A Legacy of Technical Precision
PHILOSOPHY.QUOTE: Since 2000, our goal has been to upgrade the level of engineering services by combining technical accuracy with speed in performance.
PHILOSOPHY.TEXT: We invest continuously in our technical assets to maintain the highest standards of engineering excellence.

SERVICES.SUBHEADER: We combine Abaad's engineering precision with Sama's execution excellence.

ABAAD_DESIGN.TITLE: Architectural & MEP Design
ABAAD_DESIGN.DESC: Comprehensive structural, electrical, and mechanical planning for complex facilities.

ABAAD_SURVEY.TITLE: Surveying & Unit Sorting
ABAAD_SURVEY.DESC: Precision land surveying and Real Estate Unit Sorting (Farz) for property development.

SAMA_CONTRACTING.TITLE: General Contracting
SAMA_CONTRACTING.DESC: Execution of public and private buildings, including water and sanitation infrastructure.

SAMA_RESTORATION.TITLE: Restoration & Landscaping
SAMA_RESTORATION.DESC: Building restoration, interior finishing, and the development of gardens and parks.

STEP1.TITLE: Surveying & Planning
STEP1.DESC: Topographical surveys and real estate unit sorting (Farz) to establish the ground truth.

STEP2.TITLE: Design & Engineering
STEP2.DESC: Architectural, structural, and MEP design for robust and efficient facilities.

STEP3.TITLE: Execution & Contracting
STEP3.DESC: General contracting, sanitation works, and infrastructure implementation.

STEP4.TITLE: Operation & Maintenance
STEP4.DESC: Facility management, building restoration, and high-end finishing.

SYNERGY.SUBHEADER: Discover how Abaad Al-Erteqaa's engineering expertise and Sama's safety solutions work together to deliver comprehensive project excellence.

ARCHITECTURAL.TITLE: Architectural & Interior Design
ARCHITECTURAL.DESC: Creative concepts for residential, commercial, and hospitality projects.

SAFETY_DESIGN.TITLE: Safety Engineering Design
SAFETY_DESIGN.DESC: Creating security and safety plans compliant with Civil Defense regulations (Safety 1 & 2).

SUPERVISION.TITLE: Supervision & Project Management
SUPERVISION.DESC: Ensuring on-site execution matches the highest quality standards.

URBAN.TITLE: Urban Planning & Surveying
URBAN.DESC: Topographical surveys, infrastructure planning, and contour mapping.

TRAFFIC.TITLE: Traffic & Environmental Studies
TRAFFIC.DESC: Specialized impact studies for major developments.

FIREFIGHTING.TITLE: Fire Fighting Systems
FIREFIGHTING.DESC: Installation of automatic sprinkler systems (wet & dry), fire pumps, and FM200/CO2 suppression systems.

WARNING.TITLE: Early Warning Systems
WARNING.DESC: Advanced fire alarm installation and programming.

MAINTENANCE.TITLE: Maintenance Contracts
MAINTENANCE.DESC: Annual maintenance for hotels, hospitals, and commercial towers to ensure continuous Civil Defense compliance.

EQUIPMENT.TITLE: Safety Equipment Supply
EQUIPMENT.DESC: Generators, air pressure fans, and professional safety tools.

FOOTER.BRAND_DESC: Unifying architectural brilliance with safety assurance. We are your partners in building a secure future.
